title: Interactive PDF in InDesign Resources
content:
Hello Typophiles,

Could anyone point me to any helpful resources on creating interactive PDFs in InDesign CS4? I've found a few tutorials, but I was wondering if there is a quality book/e-book written on the subject.

Thanks,  
Dan
author: Dan B.

comments.content: What about a video? There's this one [Interactive InDesign PDF & SWF](http://web.archive.org/web/20140712222455/http:/tv.adobe.com/watch/creative-sweet-tv/interactive-indesign-pdf-swf) on Adobe TV. If you do a search with [interactive pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20140712222455/http:/tv.adobe.com/search/?q=interactive+pdf&product=InDesign), you'll find several other related videos.
Thanks, Miguel. That helps too. Still looking for a more thorough resource, though.
